name: Atlantis: Pearls of the Deep
description: Save Atlantis in this unique physics-based Match-3 game!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP and above Processor: 1.2 GHz Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: 128 MB video card DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 200 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows XP and above Processor: 2.0 GHz Memory: 1024 MB RAM Graphics: 256 MB video card DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 200 MB available space
